Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_00
Interaction.Text: Ah, there you are! You must be my new assistant, yes? Thank goodness! You mustn’t keep your future captain waiting… but I will forgive you just this once.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_01
Interaction.Text: I’m not here to -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_02
Interaction.Text: Now, before I take you on as my partner, let me ask you this, ma cherie - what makes a captain, in your view?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_02_choice
Interaction.Text: The vote of the crew?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_031
Interaction.Text: The vote of -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_02_choice
Interaction.Text: Skilled leadership?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_032
Interaction.Text: Skilled lead -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_02_choice
Interaction.Text: Not sinking the ship?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_033
Interaction.Text: Not sink -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_04
Interaction.Text: I see... that’s quite charming, however, I’m afraid it lacks a certain... je ne sais quoi.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_05
Interaction.Text: We are pirates, mon amie, pirates! We sail for glory, for riches, for lavish silks and the golden gleam of treasure!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_06
Interaction.Text: So, for your first task as my dear assistant, you must help me become the very image of a true captain.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_07
Interaction.Text: I require a mark of authority, that speaks to my noble status on this ship. Something smooth and majestic to crown a true captain! Do you understand?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_08
Interaction.Text: Hm? Oh, yeah, sure.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_09
Interaction.Text: Excellent! With such disorder on our noble vessel, I had feared no one would hear my plight… but you are a gem among scoundrels, truly!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_10
Interaction.Text: That’s me. A dirty, rotten gem of a pirate.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_11
Interaction.Text: Surely you can find something here, can you not? Go ahead and get to it! Chop chop!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_00
Interaction.Text: Have you found it yet, ma cherie? That regal something that will anoint me as a true captain?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_00_choice
Interaction.Text: What were you looking for again?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_00_choice
Interaction.Text: No, not yet.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_10
Interaction.Text: For shame, mon amie! Were you not listening?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_11
Interaction.Text: Like all true captains, I have a charming physique worthy of my position. However…

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_12
Interaction.Text: I wish I had something a bit more human to adorn my sleek metal. Something to keep the sun from reflecting off of my head…

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_13
Interaction.Text: Yes, something soft, and lusciously flowing in the wind! Something I was tragically made without…

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_14
Interaction.Text: So... you want a wig?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_15
Interaction.Text: A wig?! I never! How crude! I… well. I suppose, between you and I…

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_16
Interaction.Text: Yes! Very well! It will do. Now hurry! Chop chop!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_30
Interaction.Text: Well get to it! Chop chop!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_fail_00
Interaction.Text: Oh? Have you found it? Let me...

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_fail_01
Interaction.Text: Oh? Have you found it? Let me...

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_fail_02
Interaction.Text: Ahaha! Oh, la la! Ohohoho! You must be joking, ma cherie... what a drab, grey mess that is!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_fail_03
Interaction.Text: I’m afraid that no captain would want anything to do with it! Hurry along now, and find me something nice.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_success_00
Interaction.Text: What have you brought me? Let me see, now.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_success_01
Interaction.Text: One...ah...handcrafted wig for the would-be captain.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_success_02
Interaction.Text: Hm? What is this? So sleek, woven of such lovely fibers, like the shining coat of a raven in flight! It’s the very image of captainly beauty! Fantastique!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_00
Interaction.Text: You’ve been wonderful thus far, ma cherie, simply wonderful. Now, are you ready for your next task?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_01
Interaction.Text: Actually, I kind of have to g-

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_02
Interaction.Text: Excellent! Allow me to explain. Now that I have the proper fittings of a captain, I must spread the good word.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_04
Interaction.Text: I have created these posters as a summons for the crew to gather for a rousing speech. And all important posters must be posted posthaste!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_05
Interaction.Text: They - what?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_06
Interaction.Text: You, my dearest assistant, are to take these posters to three important members of our good crew.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_07
Interaction.Text: One shall go to our Second Mate. He is a strong ally to our cause, and quite fashionable. He should be nearby, I believe.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_08
Interaction.Text: Ah, and the Chief Rigger as well! She should be... somewhere, I’m certain. And lastly, er… Monsieur d’Orange. His support would be, ah… healthy to have.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_11
Interaction.Text: Now hurry, ma cherie! Be on your way! I must prepare for the ceremony. And rest assured - you will have a front row seat!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_12
Interaction.Text: I can’t wait.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_00
Interaction.Text: Ah, my favorite aide-de-camp. How goes the campaigning?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_00_choice
Interaction.Text: Chief Rigger Wendy is stuck up in the rigging again.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_010
Interaction.Text: She’s trying to grab a lantern hanging up there and won’t come down.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_011
Interaction.Text: It sounds like she could use some assistance. Perhaps a polearm of some sort.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_012
Interaction.Text: She needs to get the lantern down, not stab it.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_013
Interaction.Text: Indeed. Would not a pole arm help?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_014
Interaction.Text: Oh. You do realize we organics can’t just replace body-parts on a whim, right?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_00_choice
Interaction.Text: “Monsieur d’Orange” is at his riddles again.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_021
Interaction.Text: Eh… indeed. Well, ma cherie, you are famous for getting along well with him. Better than any other, at any rate.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_022
Interaction.Text: Gee, thanks for your help.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_023
Interaction.Text: Bartholomieu always aims to please.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_00_choice
Interaction.Text: Your Second over there is too busy ogling you to take the poster.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_031
Interaction.Text: Ahahaha. Ma cherie, his healthy admiration for nobility and style is the very virtue he was promoted for!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_032
Interaction.Text: Right… He said something about securing the lifeboat. I didn’t think -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_033
Interaction.Text: Ah, yes! The most important feature of any vessel! I believe it requires tying down

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_034
Interaction.Text: Quartermaster Bonney, however, refuses to talk to me, the brute, so you may have to look elsewhere to find some line.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_00_choice
Interaction.Text: I'm on it, I'm on it.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_poster_00
Interaction.Text: I see you still have some posters to deliver.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_poster_01
Interaction.Text: Actually, I -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_poster_02
Interaction.Text: Go in haste!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_poster_03
Interaction.Text: Alright, alright, already!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_propaganda_mid_00_choice
Interaction.Text: Your posters have been posted. Posthaste.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_end_01
Interaction.Text: Beg your pardon?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_end_02
Interaction.Text: I did the thing.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_end_03
Interaction.Text: Ah! Delightful, ma cherie, splendid! It seems the people are gathering for my speech. Please, take your rightful seat!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_end_03_choice
Interaction.Text: I think I’ll pass.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_end_03_choice
Interaction.Text: I think I’ve got a uh… thing. To do. Now. Yeah. Really important.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_end_03_choice
Interaction.Text: I think you’ve got delusions of grandeur.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_end_04
Interaction.Text: I th-

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_end_05
Interaction.Text: Ah-ah-ah-ah! There is no need for thanks. As a future Captain, I reward those who do me good service. Consider it my thanks. Please, take a seat!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_default
Interaction.Text: I have nothing to say to you.
